description.plain:
The Black Heart Procession (occasionally spelled The Blackheart Procession) is an American indie rock band from San Diego, California.

The band was formed in 1997 by Pall Jenkins (Mr. Tube and the Flying Objects, Pallllap, Ugly Casanova and Three Mile Pilot) and Tobias Nathaniel (Three Mile Pilot).

annotatable.link_title: The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: The Black Heart Procession

body.plain:
The Black Heart Procession (occasionally spelled The Blackheart Procession) is an American indie rock band from San Diego, California.

The band was formed in 1997 by Pall Jenkins (Mr. Tube and the Flying Objects, Pallllap, Ugly Casanova and Three Mile Pilot) and Tobias Nathaniel (Three Mile Pilot).

songs.full_title: It's A Crime I Never Told You About The Diamonds In Your Eyes by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: It’s A Crime I Never Told You About The Diamonds In Your Eyes
songs.title_with_featured: It's A Crime I Never Told You About The Diamonds In Your Eyes
songs.embed_content: Read “It's A Crime I Never Told You About The Diamonds In Your Eyes” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: 2 by The Black Heart Procession

description_annotation.fragment: It’s A Crime I Never Told You About The Diamonds In Your Eyes

range.content: It's A Crime I Never Told You About The Diamonds In Your Eyes

annotatable.link_title: It’s A Crime I Never Told You About The Diamonds In Your Eyes by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: It's A Crime I Never Told You About The Diamonds In Your Eyes

songs.lyrics:
Down by the old fire range
You wouldn't hear a sound from my lips
But maybe someday I will see
Cause it was a crime I never told about the diamonds in your eyes
It's a crime I never told you about the diamonds in your eyes

And maybe someday we will be
Away with the wind we'll go
By the sea we'll float
Away with the wind we'll go
A million miles away
Away with the wind we'll blow
To the sea we'll float
Down along the way
Down along the way

And maybe someday I will say
I'll say please, please
Don't tear your heart from me
Cause it was a crime I never told about the diamonds in your eyes
It's a crime I never told you about the diamonds in your eyes

And maybe someday we will be
Away with the wind we'll go
By the sea we'll float
And away with the wind we'll go
A million miles away
And you'll say maybe someday we will be
And you'll say please please
Don't tear your heart from me
Away with the wind we'll go
By the sea we'll float
Away with the wind we'll blow
By the sea we'll float
Down along the way
Down along the way
Down along the wayEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: A Cry For Love by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: A Cry For Love
songs.embed_content: Read “A Cry For Love” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: Amore del Tropico by The Black Heart Procession
album.name: Amore del Tropico

annotatable.link_title: A Cry For Love by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: A Cry For Love

songs.lyrics:
Love not our love
Love isn't supposed to be this way
Love is a poison ring
And love has poured you drinks
Now love waits for you to sleep
Don't lend it to a friend
'cause you may never see that friend again
Don't bother with a cover 'cause love can
Pick out the fakes
But that's not our love
Not our love
This crime of love
Love isn't supposed to be this way
Love will sting and love will burn
Love will steal all you've learned
Yes it will but not our love
Sometimes in your back
And sometimes in your heart
It's a double edged sword
Don't you bother with a cover
'cause in a crowd love can pick out the fakes
But that's not our love
Not our love
(and the girls sing along) do you hear this cry for
Love
Do you see this crime of love
Love waits for you to sleep
Don't lend it to a friend
You can easily pick out the fakes
Don't you see this crime of love
This crime of love holds you here
Sting burn steal learn
Don't turn your back on my heart
You can easily pick out the fakesEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: The Letter by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: The Letter
songs.embed_content: Read “The Letter” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: The Spell by The Black Heart Procession
album.name: The Spell

annotatable.link_title: The Letter by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: The Letter

songs.lyrics:
I carried this letter
All through the winter
In fear of what it might say
I know the reasons
They change so fast
And we can never make it back

In the letter that you wrote
I heard the words that you never spoke
It is time for you to come home

So, I travelled the seas
To return for you
But I did not make it through

And I know it's not easy
Things can be so wrong
As we are lost in the waves

And in the letter that I wrote
Were the words I never spoke
This is why I can't come home
And in the letter that I wrote
Were the words I never spoke
This is why I can't come home
And in the letter that you wrote
Was it a letter as a friend?
This is what i must know
And in the letter that you wrote
Was it a letter as a friend?
This is what I must know1EmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Square Heart by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: Square Heart
songs.embed_content: Read “Square Heart” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: 1 by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.link_title: Square Heart by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Square Heart

songs.lyrics:
I've got a square old heart
And no one makes the parts that I need
To repair and pull me from this well, pull me from this well
But I'll be waiting, yes I'll be waiting

'Cause I've got a square old heart
They don't makes the parts that I need
To repair and pull me from this well, pull me from this well
But I'll be waiting, yes I'll be waiting

'Cause I've got a square heart
And no one makes the parts that I need
But I'll be waiting, yes I'll be waiting1EmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Fade Away by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: Fade Away
songs.embed_content: Read “Fade Away” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

annotatable.link_title: Fade Away by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Fade Away

songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Through this land of tragedy
I try to find my way
And in this town of misery
I search for you
Now we walk away
To the last of the days

[Verse 2]
And in this world
There were only memories
Of how we could get through
There was just no way to see
Now we lost our way
In the land of the day

[Verse 3]
And in this life
How will they remember me
Will they see the truth
Will they just lose everything
Now it fades away
To the end of the day4EmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Release My Heart by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: Release My Heart
songs.embed_content: Read “Release My Heart” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: 1 by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.link_title: Release My Heart by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Release My Heart

songs.lyrics:
What you gave to me I'll never forget
I was born for you before this crime began
All I ask of you is to take the knife and ....
Release my heart before you move ahead
What if I was to say to you
"you will never see me again"
I was born of you my partner in crime
And what you stole from me
I may never get it back so ....
Release my heart before you move aheadEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: A Light So Dim by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: A Light So Dim
songs.embed_content: Read “A Light So Dim” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: 2 by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.link_title: A Light So Dim by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: A Light So Dim

songs.lyrics:
There are no trains that leave from the maze
My only chance was a ship to escape
If you be the light house in the storm
I'll be the ship with a thousand dead souls
But how long will they believe in a light so dim

Down in the gallows the darkness glows
It was hard to see in the hearts of them
If you see a light call down below
I'll be moving and sorting out our tears
But how long will we believe in a light so dim

Time is all we have
So take the time
To make the time

Throw down the line I'll see to climb
If it's held close it may just work
If you are the light house in the storm
I'll be the ship filled with a thousand dead souls

Time is all we have
So take the time
To make the time1EmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: We Always Knew by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: We Always Knew
songs.embed_content: Read “We Always Knew” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: Three by The Black Heart Procession
album.name: Three

annotatable.link_title: We Always Knew by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: We Always Knew

songs.lyrics:
We want to know where truth is found
We try to breathe but life was never found in you
And of that I know
We wander on beyond the hills
And with what we stole we could never lie with them
And of that we are sure
We are sure

And life came and forgiveness was gone
Was it all to see the light
Did you come back from the quest
Was it all to see the light in your own dream
You say I guess I knew
I always knew
I guess I knew

And what holds you now will bury you then
And on what you pray you will lie with them
And of that we are sure
We are sure
I try to move but with this heart it's turned so black
But I would never lie to you
And of that I'm sure
I'm sure

Life came and forgiveness was won
Did you come back from the fires
Did you come back from the quest
Was it all to see the blood was on our hands
And say I guess I knew
We always knew
I guess we knew
We always knew
Guess I knew
Guess I knew
Guess I always knewEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: When You Finish Me by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: When You Finish Me
songs.embed_content: Read “When You Finish Me” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: Six by The Black Heart Procession
album.name: Six

annotatable.link_title: When You Finish Me by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: When You Finish Me

songs.lyrics:
When you're through with me
When your heart aches
When your head spins
When you tempt me
When you finish me
When you cut me
When you kill me
When you forgive me
When you want to hold me
If you bury me
If you miss me
Don't say a word
Don't waste your time
Don't expect me
Just get rid of me
Just drain me
Don't look for me
Don't touch me
Don't come visit me
Don't say a word
Just close your eyes
See if you remember me
Disappear with me
Don't say a word
Disappear with me
Don't you say a word
Just disappear with me
Just close your eyes
Just close your eyesEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: The Spell by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: The Spell
songs.embed_content: Read “The Spell” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: The Spell by The Black Heart Procession
album.name: The Spell

annotatable.link_title: The Spell by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: The Spell

songs.lyrics:
"Captured by you and slowly pulled into your web
The venom was smooth,so I didn't mind a thing
As I moved the strings were held there by you
Something then told me that I had no escape

So,please forgive me for this spell I am under

As the years passed by,I tried to work out the clues
To break this curse that was cast down and held by you
And in this maze at every turn you stood in my way
So I left a disguise in my place

So,please forgive me for this spell I am under

I lose myself in this spell I am under
I feel your spell on me...

We're held by your gaze,lost in a state
A potion of delusion,something is brewing
The poison is blinding
The streets are all winding
The clocks lose their timing
Your spell on me has no cure

So,please forgive me for this spell I am under
I lose myself in this spell I am under
I feel your spell on me...."EmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Forget My Heart by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: Forget My Heart
songs.embed_content: Read “Forget My Heart” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: Six by The Black Heart Procession
album.name: Six

annotatable.link_title: Forget My Heart by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Forget My Heart

songs.lyrics:
Look what you've done to me
Look at my tears
Forget my heart
No reason to lie to me it can't get any worse
Every little thing that you do to me
Every single day that goes by
Every inch and every mile
Everything that I do takes me away from you
Look what I've done to you
Look at your tears
I forgot your heart No reason to lie to you
It can't get any worse
Every little thing that I do to you
Everything I say breaks your heart
I guess I should have known
I guess I have no choice
I guess I lost your heart
I guess this pain won't stop
I guess I killed my friend
I guess this is the end
Throwing it away We're throwing this all awayEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Bluewater/Blackheart by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: Bluewater/Blackheart
songs.embed_content: Read “Bluewater/Blackheart” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: 1 by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.link_title: Bluewater/Blackheart by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Bluewater/Blackheart

songs.lyrics:
I fell like a dove into the desert
Barely breathing my tears built (filled) an ocean
I was out on the levee--I was out on the levee
When I lost my self into the water, into the water, into the water

They came at night and said to me
To rest is forbidden
You must move or drown away
I was out on the jetty--I was out on the jetty
When I lost myself into the water, into the water, into the water

I'll be alive--I'll squeeze through the light

I fell like a dove into the desert
Barely breathing my tears filled the ocean
I was out on the levee--I was out on the levee
When I lost my self into the water, into the water, into the water, into the water, into the water, into the water, into the water...EmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: When We Reach The Hill by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: When We Reach The Hill
songs.embed_content: Read “When We Reach The Hill” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: 2 by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.link_title: When We Reach The Hill by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: When We Reach The Hill

songs.lyrics:
Something scared you and when you moved
Your stitches pulled not yet removed
We formed this link a thousand years before
Then you turn and say
If you leave how can you leave on this hook
Cause we'll grow old here, you can never leave
Cause we'll grow old, you can never leave

And what keeps me here has grown into me
And I can't tear free a style awaits to coin us
And I peg you
Yes I seal the mold then you turn and say
If you leave how can you leave on this hook
Cause we'll grow old here, you will never leave
Cause we'll grow old, you will never leave

When we reach the hill
When we reach the hillEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: The Waiter No. 2 by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: The Waiter No. 2
songs.embed_content: Read “The Waiter No. 2” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: 2 by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.link_title: The Waiter No. 2 by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: The Waiter No. 2

songs.lyrics:
In the time of this winter the waiter had not much to say
He could hear the clock but he could not find his way
If I'm so far from your heart why do I feel it beat
And time won't wait for usEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: The Old Kind Of Summer by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: The Old Kind Of Summer
songs.embed_content: Read “The Old Kind Of Summer” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: 1 by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.link_title: The Old Kind Of Summer by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: The Old Kind Of Summer

songs.lyrics:
Every day goes by and every night the same
I sit and think of how I'm so much
Further away from you
Every time I wake, I'll slowly mark the day

'Cause this life has taken me so much
Further away from you
Every sunset and every time it rains
Every walk I take I'll count the steps

Further away from you
If I should fall in love again, I will know that
I'm only that much further from you
You'll fall in love again someday, I know

You'll see the light and I'll be awayEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Suicide by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: Suicide
songs.embed_content: Read “Suicide” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: Six by The Black Heart Procession
album.name: Six

annotatable.link_title: Suicide by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Suicide

songs.lyrics:
As my bones creak and my veins scream
While my spirit breaks I hear you calling me

As my heart aches and my hands shake
While my mind fades from these dark days

In the valley where I come from
Everybody watches the blood run
No one will lend you a knife or a gun

But they'll cut your wrists
And hang you by the neck
I like your suicide
You show up in the middle of the night
Blood drippin from your wrists
Pills on your tongue and a gun in your hand
A rope around your neck
I hope god is your friend
I like your suicideEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Even Thieves Couldn't Lie by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: Even Thieves Couldn’t Lie
songs.embed_content: Read “Even Thieves Couldn't Lie” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: 1 by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.link_title: Even Thieves Couldn’t Lie by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Even Thieves Couldn't Lie

songs.lyrics:
It was mid-October when they would meet at the lake
Down on barrelhill road beneath the moon
There were no fish in the sky just catching sparks
From all these falling stars
His heart would never slip off the track
'cause this girl wasn't afraid of his tears
So on one of those nights they got into the car
She pointed at the map and said
"any place looks good to me, just run with me"
She said "any place looks good to me
As long as you run with me away from here"
She said "we don't need money when we've got us
Because power it'll make any man weak I know"

Even thieves they couldn't lie not when you look into her eyes
All your plans will fall apart
The storm held back beyond the mountains
As the birds built the nest to lay her head
Then she flew away from here

The wind blows and her voice hides behind the trees
As i walk to visit her grave
So i climb into bed then close my eyes (close your eyes)
And i can still hear her say
"any place looks good to me, just run with me"
She said "any place" even in my dreams
As long as you run with me away from here
She would say "we don't need the money when we've got us"
"because power it'll make any man weak, I know"
But it's her power that made this man so very weak
She said "run with me away from here"EmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Blue Tears by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: Blue Tears
songs.embed_content: Read “Blue Tears” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: 2 by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.link_title: Blue Tears by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Blue Tears

songs.lyrics:
Now I know that I must leave
And I can't remember when I ever felt so great
It was my time spent with you before the war

But now these blue tears
They keep falling
Falling down from my lonely eyes
They're falling for you

I can see the ship's reflection in your eyes
From behind me
Telling that I have no other way
And it was hard to turn and leave

Now these blue tears
They keep falling
Falling down from my lonely eyes
And they're blue tears
They keep falling
Falling down from my lonely eyes
Falling down from my lonely eyes
And they're falling from my lonely eyes
They're falling for youEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Your Church Is Red by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: Your Church Is Red
songs.embed_content: Read “Your Church Is Red” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: 2 by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.link_title: Your Church Is Red by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Your Church Is Red

songs.lyrics:
When I fell inside out of the snow and by your fire
In this time I've learned
Change your hate cause that's your slave
Turn your head from your evil ways
Your church is red blood flows black from your heart
We build our temple one brick at a time
And the straw I steal to build your nest
I've learned
Change your hate cause that's your slave
When you turn your head from the evil ways
Your church is red blood flows black
And when the bells ring they'll all come to see
When the bells ring out tonight
For my wounded heart

You can paint it over cause below I know
And when the bells ring they'll all come to see
There's a fire in the fields a killer in the mirror
When the bells ring out tonight
For my change of heartEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Last Chance by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: Last Chance
songs.embed_content: Read “Last Chance” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: Six by The Black Heart Procession
album.name: Six

annotatable.link_title: Last Chance by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Last Chance

songs.lyrics:
In this life I found heaven and hell
In your eyes I see love and hate
In the desert I found life
I found death
They come to take back your soul
That can't escape
The pastEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Guess I'll Forget You by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: Guess I’ll Forget You
songs.embed_content: Read “Guess I'll Forget You” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: Three by The Black Heart Procession
album.name: Three

annotatable.link_title: Guess I’ll Forget You by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Guess I'll Forget You

songs.lyrics:
Now you know there's no light on the waves
But before i turn there's just one last word
Then i'll try to forget you
Now they say there's no light in the caves
And we all know there's no way out
I'll try and forget you
But before i go i must say
That in my heart you'll always be found
Always but i'll try to forget you
I guess i'll forget youEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: The Waiter by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: The Waiter
songs.embed_content: Read “The Waiter” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: 1 by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.link_title: The Waiter by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: The Waiter

songs.lyrics:
In a cabin out where it's cold
There's a waiter serving time
He remembers she said
"I'll be there yes I'll be there
Someday when the snow thaws"
So he stands watching the snow fall
In his hand a clock on a platter
He remembers she said
"I'll be there yes I'll be there
Every night your eyes dream"
"dream dream my lonely one"EmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: The Invitation by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: The Invitation
songs.embed_content: Read “The Invitation” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: Amore del Tropico by The Black Heart Procession
album.name: Amore del Tropico

annotatable.link_title: The Invitation by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: The Invitation

songs.lyrics:
You will always be here with me
You will find them so willing
You will find them in the shadows
You will find us in the shadows
We hideEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Drugs by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: Drugs
songs.embed_content: Read “Drugs” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: Six by The Black Heart Procession
album.name: Six

annotatable.link_title: Drugs by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Drugs

songs.lyrics:
I took your poison to see how you suffer
I took your drugs to see you high
I took your hand to walk with you
I lost my mind to lose my love
When we give up and lose our grip
When we'd forget all the laws
And tear down the lights
When we'd drive through the dark
To the night wind song
When I remember these times
I try not to cryEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Tropics Of Love by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: Tropics Of Love
songs.embed_content: Read “Tropics Of Love” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: Amore del Tropico by The Black Heart Procession
album.name: Amore del Tropico

annotatable.link_title: Tropics Of Love by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Tropics Of Love

songs.lyrics:
Oh comfort you comfort you come from far away
Oh listen don't ever betray what you feel
Comfort you comfort you come from far away
Don't ever trust the things they say
Was it here where we left our hearts
Was it here in the tropics of love
Remorse, remorse with it everyday
'cause i feel it that way
Don't ever barter with yourself
Comfort is why we lost our hearts
Was it here where we left our hearts
In the tropics of love
Was it here in the tropics of love
So remember, remember, remember i say
When they've taken this comfort away
I'll be there every day
Remember, remember, remember i say
I'll be there every single dayEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: A Heart The Size Of A Horse by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: A Heart The Size Of A Horse
songs.title_with_featured: A Heart The Size Of A Horse
songs.embed_content: Read “A Heart The Size Of A Horse” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: 1 by The Black Heart Procession

description_annotation.fragment: A Heart The Size Of A Horse

range.content: A Heart The Size Of A Horse

annotatable.link_title: A Heart The Size Of A Horse by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: A Heart The Size Of A Horse

songs.lyrics:
Lights down everything's closed
I sit outside in the rain that pins me here
You were in the trinity of my beating heart
You were in the trinity of my beating heart

I should have known when my heart fell from the horse
To something less than me
You were in the trinity of my beating heart

From all the rain the vines have grown over
And trap me here inside my home
There's a fence looks tired and old
Escape the grove

You were the trinity of my beating heart
You were in the trinity of my beating heart
I should have known when my heart fell from the horse
To something less than...
You were in the trinity of my beating heartEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: The Waiter No. 3 by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: The Waiter No. 3
songs.embed_content: Read “The Waiter No. 3” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: 2 by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.link_title: The Waiter No. 3 by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: The Waiter No. 3

songs.lyrics:
In the time of the winter the waiter fell into the snow
He could hear a voice but will he ever find his way
If I'm so far from your heart why do I feel it beat
And time won't wait for usEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Stitched To My Heart by The Black Heart Procession

album.full_title: 1 by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.link_title: Stitched To My Heart by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Stitched To My Heart

songs.lyrics:
My heart is bleeding rain drops, they're lonely rain drops
When it used to shower all night long
And in the well they'll find my heart, that I gave to you

My heart is bleeding rain drops, they're lonely rain drops
When it used to shower all night long
And in the well they'll find my heart, that I gave to you

And in the end they'll find your name, stitched to my heart, stitched to my heart

I've been locked away--I'll keep locked away, I'll keep locked away
Where they'll find no trace
I'll keep locked away
Where they'll find no trace

And in the well they'll find my heart, that I gave to you
And in the end they'll find her name, stitched to my heart
And in the end they'll find her name, stitched to my heart, stitched to my heart (stitched to my heart)

They're lonely rain drops, they're lonely rain drop, they're lonely rain dropsEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Not Just Words by The Black Heart Procession
songs.title: Not Just Words
songs.embed_content: Read “Not Just Words” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: The Spell by The Black Heart Procession
album.name: The Spell

annotatable.link_title: Not Just Words by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Not Just Words

songs.lyrics:
Days peel off and pass away
Like souvenirs from a distant place
Postcards from your memories

Just like an old love line
Or dividing wall that fell

This'll never be forgotten
These are not just words

Do you remember
The things we said?
Do you remember
The things we said?

The smoke and script changed through the years
The stories blend and lies were fed
I know some things can't be explained

Just like an old scar
Or this thorn in my side

This'll never be forgotten
These are not just words

Do you remember
The things we said?
Do you remember
The things we said?
I'll try to remember
The things we said
I'll try to remember
The things we said

Of all these things we have forgotten
There are no "just words"EmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Heart Like Mine by The Black Heart Procession

album.full_title: Three by The Black Heart Procession
album.name: Three

annotatable.link_title: Heart Like Mine by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Heart Like Mine

songs.lyrics:
She stood at the sea in the photograph
I saw the ship approach to take her love away
Oh please, if they should ask you
Tell them you knew a heart like mine
Yes, a heart like mine

She is the one in the photograph
So I cross the sea to find the love I lost
Oh please, if they should ask you
Tell them you knew a heart like mine

And if they should ask me
I'll tell them I knew a heart like yours
And a heart like mineEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Gently Off The Edge by The Black Heart Procession

album.full_title: 2 by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.link_title: Gently Off The Edge by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Gently Off The Edge

songs.lyrics:
There was a murder and a heart on some other road
It was colored drinks but most of all this empty seat next to me
And I felt life getting older and something had to unfold
And if there's a chance that I could be with you
As a distant ring something in your mind
And you would think of me when you are away

There was a ring in a film that was dated 1863
But dead men can't tell the truth of lies is what filled up his day
And we feel life getting older as something has to unfold
If there's a chance that I could be with you
As a distant ring something in your mind
And you would think of me when you are away

Listen to my call please come home
Come home come home cause I feel so alone
You listen you listen but nobody's there
You wait for a sign will they appear
You know they'll say that I am the oneEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

annotatable.link_title: My Heart Might Stop by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: My Heart Might Stop

songs.lyrics:
Please don't be too long for my heart might just stop someday
You were looking but I couldn't find cause I didn't know
They had come for you on ships of gold to take you away
Please don't be too long for my heart might just stop someday
Outside the sky lit up and I didn't know what I would say
When they came for you on ships of gold to take you away
I just watched you leave I never spoke a wordEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

Outside there's a war
Mothers hold their sons
Cause soon they will be men
And have to say goodbye
Cause they'll never know this life
Till they have to say goodbye
I felt for you the way few ever do
And i still wonder why we had to say goodbye
But you'll never know this life
Till ya have to say goodbye
Do we have to say goodbyeEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Waterfront (The Sinking Road) by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.title: Waterfront (The Sinking Road)

songs.lyrics:
This is a sinking anchor that we hold so dear
Were you worn out from the start cut out and never
Replaced
You held at arms length
You so afraid
You by the waterfront
You still alive
You move away
You want to wash away what ills your heart
You stand by the waterfront never sure of your choice
This is a sinking road that we all travel on
You by the waterfront
You swollen with a crimeEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

annotatable.link_title: Tangled by The Black Heart Procession

songs.lyrics:
There is a place where I stay near the sea
Always alive she said in me you'll be

Drawn into your web
I'm tangled in your web

Hiding in the smoke and trees we live
All these lives give me strength she said

Drawn into your web
I'm tangled in your web

Trapped in your web I'll always be
Wrapped around your heart like thorns you sting
Tangled in my heart you will stayEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

This isn't wise they say
To force a line engraved
Though we may come close
These things won't ever change
This is why i know
This is why i must go
And so the game is plagued
With the rituals we've made
I know we won't ever learn
These things they'll never change
This is why i stay
But this is why i must goEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

annotatable.link_title: Sympathy Crime by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Sympathy Crime

songs.lyrics:
This one finds you nowhere
Abandoned your truth unfolds
You came
You failed
And it means nothing
This one you take with you
This is one i could never forget
You run to that side
And it means nothing
You fade into that life
Where it means nothing
This is what they want you to think
It was torn from you then you fade from them
And you wait you wait so long
'till it means nothing
Don't wait don't wait so long
'till it means nothing
(the girls sing) crime crime crime
Ascent and decline
Crime crime crime
It's a sympathy crimeEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: In A Tin Flask by The Black Heart Procession

album.full_title: 1 by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.link_title: In A Tin Flask by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: In A Tin Flask

songs.lyrics:
I can't remember when she went away
But I'll keep a light on beside my bed
The pillow soft and the blanket warm
Oh I have walked the old winding road
Has anybody seen a love alone as mine?
Searched her grave and across the plains
Beneath the sea but I still can't find her
Has anybody seen my queen of grace?
'Cause I can't remember when she left
Without her to hold what use are my arms?

Can somebody point the way?
Oh I have walked the old winding road
Has anybody seen a love alone like mine?

Searched her grave and across the plains
Beneath the sea but I still can't find her
I can't remember why she left
I just know she's far away
And I won't find her in the corner
In a tin flask from my coat
And I won't find her in the corner
In a tin flask from my coatEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

annotatable.link_title: Broken World by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Broken World

songs.lyrics:
I know that you are through with me
I know that you want to get rid of me
I know that you have a plan for me
I know that you want to torture me
Now we'll never meet again
Not in this broken world
We'll never meet again
Not in this broken world
This time with you felt so smooth
I guess i never really knew
That you were through with me
And i guess that you
You were finished with me
Now we'll never meet again
Not in this broken world
Our time is through
In this broken world
We'll never meet again
Our time is throughEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Wasteland by The Black Heart Procession

album.name: Six

annotatable.link_title: Wasteland by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Wasteland

songs.lyrics:
This is the wasteland of all shattered hearts
I hear the ghosts calling me back to the grave
I'm here to even the score
I've come to hell for you
I'm not leaving till the devil is dead
The devil is dead
These are the tracks we lay
To take us from the flames
These are the scars made by our chains
You're here to torture me
I've come to hell for you
I'm not leaving till I tear out your heart
I'm not leaving till the devil is dead
The devil is dead
This is the wastelandEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: I Know Your Ways by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.title: I Know Your Ways

songs.lyrics:
Rely
Was down time when you meet the end
Was frozen yet taught as you came
If one was and the others not like you
So the reason is to rely on that one
Cause i know your ways
And i know what you'll say
And i know how you think
That i'll always run back
When it all falls away
And comes back to me and you
It always comes back to me and you
Down there what will they find
It's the way that the light all decaysEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.lyrics:
Bothered and distraught i slowly wake
I didn't know just how it got to be this way
Did you ever wonder why we bother sometimes
Did you ever wonder why we bother so
Its wired in and sewn to our days
I didn't know we had to make it through the maze
At every turn there's a wall
Nothing grows in here
Did you ever wonder why we bother sometimes
Did you ever wonder why we bother so
You will see a light on the way
We grow old and grey and move so slowEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

Every night it's the same
I wait for you
Daylight takes you away
Night time brings you back
It's been so long
The days last so long
When I wake
The light seeps in and i know i have no defense
Something took you away but the night time will bring you back
It's been so long
The days last so long
In the night i wait for you to bring me back
In the night i wait for you and bring you back
When i can bring you backEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: A Sign On The Road by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.title: A Sign On The Road

songs.lyrics:
Did you not see
Wasn't it clear
Or did you just speed by
Ignoring the signs on the road
The signs on the road
Did you not hear
Nobody's coming home
And if it was true
Believe the lines all lead back to you
A mission that leads you astray
Not choosing the right path instead
Wasn't it clear
The writing on the wall
Did you not hear nobody's coming home
Don't let it pass you by
Don't leave it all behindEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

annotatable.link_title: Witching Stone by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Witching Stone

songs.lyrics:
I could hear a needle drop
I could find the perfect spot
I could see the colors and
Explain them all to you
I could see the building storm
Out where the lightning falls
Out in the electric night
Through the poppy fields

I can hear the sirens call
Just below the mountain top
Out in the poison fog under the moon
I can see them waiting there
Out on the witching stone
Out in the electric night
Through the poppy fields

It's your turn to resist
That's just the way it is
It's your curse to the end
That's just the way it isEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Never From This Heart by The Black Heart Procession

Now there was never a sound
No never from this heart
She was born by the sea
You look so weak
Life won't let you go away
Life won't let you go to waste
Now as a fire erupts in a heart so immune
So you return to the sea
And remember all these things you let float away
Into another life
Where they floated for yearsEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.lyrics:
On this day i was wondering just what made the sky
Blue
I was thinking if i'd ever leave this place
I saw the storm pass overhead along the sky
You'll be gone on that day i know
I'll be coming home on these ships of gold
I never knew the lies you said were true
And i never knew that all the ships had holes
And i never knew this life was all for you
I didn't know i'd ever get this far
I never knew all these ships had holes
I didn't know i'd reach this far to sink
I didn't know i never knew
I didn't know....EmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.lyrics:
In a cabin out where it's cold
There's a waiter serving time
He remembers she said
"I'll be there yes I'll be there
Someday when the snow thaws"
So he stands watching the snow fall
In his hand a clock on a platter
He remembers she said
"I'll be there yes I'll be there
Every night your eyes dream"
"dream dream my lonely one"EmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Heart Without A Home by The Black Heart Procession

annotatable.link_title: Heart Without A Home by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Heart Without A Home

songs.lyrics:
[Subtitle:  (The Great Flood)]

Fear lights the way--you came and went
You held it close to your heart
Don't take the wires from my back
'Cause I can't move on my own
Once held so close, though my heart has no home

So long--it's been so long
Will I find my way back home again? (home again, home again...)

I crawled from the sea, cold and alone
There were sounds all through the night, as I ran
And now silence fills the air
As the years flood my mind
Once held so close, now my heart has no home

So long--it's been so long
Will I find my way back home again?
I was on my way home again, home againEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.lyrics:
Everywhere around they circle in to feed
You cross your heart not to live a life like them
Down here all along out here by the fire
They'll warm their hands and know there's others here
Like them
Down here all along second to none
They'll wash their hands know they never agreed
Then when they want to know they'll come back and find
There's no way home
No there's no way back home
Everyone around circles to defeat
They cross our hearts and time's not the sameEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

I am the one who has disappeared
This one's for forgiveness so they say
I'm that one
I am the one
Who has no name
I have no name

The way you look through me
I know i'm the one
Who has disappearedEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.lyrics:
Am I alive or am I dead
Am I awake or in a dream
Am I with you or am I all alone
Do I have skin do I have bones
Do I reveal or show no more
Should I place a bet or end this game
If I dream or if I stay awake
This fear this fright it haunts me either way
It follows me down to the end of the world'
Am I too weak do I have the strength
Do I have needs am I ok
Am I sick am I well
Am I on the ground or in the clouds
Am I here or a world away

Time won't forget the lies
Time can't forget the lies
Till the day you die Where memory is gone
You won't forget the lies
You can't forget the lies
Till the day you die
It's not meant to stay It ain't everything It
Ain't anyway
It's in everything It's in every way It ain't
Every day
It ain't anything It's not meant to stay It's n
Ot what you say
It's not meant to stay
Time won't forget your lies
Time can't forget your lies
Till the day you die

I could never understand your words
I never knew what you were trying to say
I saw you place your hand over your heart
And I can hear the waves just outside your gate
I'm going away
I'm going away

And this space I leave for you
For the rest of my life
I'm going away
I can hear the waves

I'm going away

songs.full_title: The War Is Over by The Black Heart Procession

songs.lyrics:
And if this war was over
Would you stay
Would you lie beside me
If the war was over
Would you stay
And if the war was over
I could go anywhere I felt with you
If the war was over
I lie awake and dream of you
It won't be long till I'm home if you wait
Now if this war was over
And the confetti skies were so filled with pride
If this war was over
I lie awake
Do you lie and wait awake and dream of me
It won't be long
It won't be long
'Till I'm home
It won't be long
It won't be long
'Till I'm home if you wait
Now that the war is over
Will you stay
Will you lie beside me
The war is over
It is over
It is over for meEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Rats by The Black Heart Procession

songs.embed_content: Read “Rats” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: Six by The Black Heart Procession
album.name: Six

annotatable.link_title: Rats by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Rats

songs.lyrics:
I can't sleep tonight the devil's in the moon
So I walk the city streets
I take big steps to get nowhere
I look at the lights
There's nothing here for me
I can't see the stars in the sky
The buildings reach to high

I can't sleep tonight
I see rats
I can't stay alive
I see the pimps I see the whores
I see the thieves outside your door
I look down the alley where I left my life
I see rats in the sewer at night

She said if I leave I won't come back
She said if I leave I won't come back

I can't sleep tonight
I see rats
I can't stay alive
I can't stay alive from the devil's making room
I walk from the alley where I left my life
I see rats with blood in their eyes
I said if you leave don't come back
I said if you leave don't ever come back
I can't sleep tonight
I see rats
I can't stay aliveEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.lyrics:
There's only one way

There's only one way

There are lies then there is truth
What hides between we did not know
What we give away we soon forget

There's only one way
There's only one way
There's only one way
There's only one way

Even though we've seen
We trust the ways we bleed
If only to waste
We crush it in our hands
Then move away
I see
What we give away we soon forget
We give up the search
We'd as soon forget

There's only one way
Only one way
There's only one way
Only one way
There's only one way
Only one way
Only one way

Only one way to your heart

There's only one way
Only one way
There's only one way
Only one way
There's only one way
Only one way

Only one wayEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

annotatable.link_title: The Waiter #4 by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: The Waiter #4

songs.lyrics:
This is you and this is me
No one understands
What is this i’ve become
As memory fades
You left me years ago
Where the sky and the snow turn red
This is you and this is me
No one understands
This is why i’ve waited
To retrace a certain voice
Summer’s winter’s cure
Somewhere through the years
I replaced a certain pain
And summer’s winter’s cure
Yet i remainEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.lyrics:
They found fingerprints
This is what you stole from your heart and mine
Stood in the way
Stood so long i knew it would be said
It was on that way you made it all up inside of me
Now for once i see it's never gonna change
Fingerprints they found fingerprints
They never want to have to change
Stay where you belong
No no no
Turn our heads we turn our heads
Fingerprints they found my fingerprints
You know your ways will never change
No no no
Turn our heads we turn our heads
To avoid the fingerprints
Fingerprints they found my fingerprintsEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.lyrics:
All our fears are fed
All our thoughts are read
All things divide and they bend into you
All things collide again

All our crimes revealed
All our dreams are killed
All the controls are dead
All things divide and bend into you
All things collide again
All things divide and bend
All things collide in the end

All the things you fight
Are all the reasons to rise
Would you believe when I say
All these things hang by a thread
Would you believe when I say
All these things hang by a threadEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

annotatable.link_title: The Visitor by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: The Visitor

songs.lyrics:
Now from the tides one crawls out
So to stand we may move on
You bleed you blister in the sun
You bleed for everyone
Now it's time for all visitors here to leave
Now so close we turn back
But remember no one leaves
You bleed you blister in the sun
You bleed for everyone
Our visit here is through
And now it's time to leaveEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

songs.full_title: Voiture En Rouge by The Black Heart Procession (Ft. Solbakken)
songs.title: Voiture En Rouge
songs.embed_content: Read “Voiture En Rouge” by The Black Heart Procession on Genius

album.full_title: In The Fishtank 11 by The Black Heart Procession
album.name: In The Fishtank 11

annotatable.link_title: Voiture En Rouge by The Black Heart Procession (Ft. Solbakken)
annotatable.title: Voiture En Rouge

songs.lyrics:
Défilant, le long d'une route sinueuse
Les rochers, le vent, l'océan une voiture rouge
Nos sens s'enivrent, et chaque secondes de nos vies, défilent
Les traces noires, la barrière cassée, mais que vas-tu faire?
Un nuage de poussière
Et comme toi, le soleil, n'était qu'une lune, grise

[Chorus]
And here, is where we, look back
And here, is where we start
And now, I'll return

[Bridge]

Les vagues, le sel sur mes lèvres, et enfin, la joie m'envahie
Le soleil, se noie avec moi, mes souvenirs s'effacent, je te retrouve, enfin...
Je me penche, vers la main, qui tient mon coeur, mais il n'y a plus personne, que des feuilles, soufflés, par le vent

[Chorus]

And here, is where we, look back
And here, is where we start
And yes, this is the end

[Chorus repeat]
And here, is where we, look back
And here, is where we start
Now, I'll returnEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

annotatable.link_title: Return to Burn by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Return to Burn

songs.lyrics:
Every moment in every second
Every day that I’m awake
Every chance that I get
I am frozen in regret
Every day shows signs of rust
And I watch the sky turn gray

I am frozen

Every moment in every second
Every step that I take
I am frozen by these things
I find another way to burn my soul again
And I watch the days go by

I am frozen every time I return to burn
Every time I return to burnEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

annotatable.link_title: All My Steps by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: All My Steps

songs.lyrics:
Out on a boat I'm all alone
Out on the road I'm on my own
I see my life
Staring in the mirror
I'm throwing stones
Standing in front of the ocean
I see the waves they're coming for me

All of my life
I tried to escape your love
All, all of my steps away
I tried to cover my tracks

Walking through hell in a daze
I count the graves
I search for my soul
Falling from heaven I'm losing my senses
Will you ever forgive me
I'm burning in flames
Holding you closely you whisper
"You're choking me"
But I can't let go
Standing beside you
This feeling is driving me insane
This love so dangerous
All of my life
I tried to escape your love
All, all of my steps away
I tried to cover my tracksEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

annotatable.link_title: Back to the Underground by The Black Heart Procession
annotatable.title: Back to the Underground

songs.lyrics:
I was headed to the gallows
I was to hang or burn in flames
I remember the day you lit the fire
And watched our love turn to dust

I remember the flames higher and higher
I remember the way you laughed before you
Finally set me free
I try to recover every time
But every time I'm back on the ground
Back underground
Back underground
Every time

I was forced into the shadows
I was the fool beaten and bruised by the game
I held on to all of our ashes

I remember the flames higher and higher
I remember the way you laughed before you
Finally set me free
I try to recover every time
But every time I'm back on the ground
I try to recover every time
But every time I'm back on the ground
Back underground
Back underground
Every timeEmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy
